name: Evolution Carnex
description:
Evolution Carnex is a game about evolving yourself into a powerful being and slaying monsters.

Your main objective in the beginning is the survival as you progress through a evolution tree (of your choice) and building  strength to defeat the evil monsters.

Will you defeat the monstrosities that awaits you?

Right now following thinks are implemented:

  • 10 different Evolutions
  • Crafting System
  • Events
  • 13 Recipes (2 of them are legendary and hidden ;D)
  • 30 Items/Weapons/Armors
  • Injury System
  • CHICKENS

The Game gets constantly updated and new stuff added.

Please consider that this is the first game i have ever created and that it's in pre Alpha Stage now..

If you find some bugs feel free to right them down in the comment section, i will try to do my best to fix as many of them as possible!

Since i am working alone on this project it may take some time to respond or fix bugs. (sorry)

I look forward to your feedback and hopefully you have fun playing the game!

If you liked the game feel free to support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/dominikfraissl

I would really appreciate it! (you also receive some goodies in exchange)
